description: Triangle related to A001700 and A000302 (powers of 4).
formula: a(n, m) = binomial(n, m-1)*(binomial(2*n, n)/binomial(2*(m-1), m-1) - 4^(n-m+1)*(m-1)/n)/2, n >= m >= 1. G.f. for column m: x*c(x)*((x/(1-4*x))^(m-1))/sqrt(1-4*x); c(x = g.f. for Catalan numbers (A000108).
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
